resources.string: This program only for Ainol devices that have Actions ATM7029 processor.
Please put device on a level surface and stand still.
Functions Fix freezes and color gamut dont require inclusion on all devices.\nTheir inclusion can cause data loss,bricking devices.
To use this function you need to use the latest firmware(Ainol SDK1224) or another fw based on SDK1224!
Backup recovery partition successfully made in
Copy rec.img into AT_Dir and start installation.

string.name: advices_text
string.b:
After switching on/off function Fix freezes required:
 1. Reboot tablet into recovery mode(Only TWRP or CWM).
 2. Install freezes_fix_xxx.zip/freezes_unfix_xxx.zip and reboot your tablet.

 To install recovery you need:
 1. Copy rec.img(fs fat16) in which is stock,twrp,cwm recovery, to AT_Dir.
 2. Press Recovery installer button and after 30 sec he will be installed.
.

b.i:
Ainol Toolkit
 Mobile tool for Ainol devices that have Actions ATM7029 processor.


 Author: iBullRay.
 Version: 6.1.
 Copyright © 2016, SharkAndroid.

resources.string:
Version 6.1

 * Added Recovery backup function.
 * Added HDMI mode index in About system.
 * Warning dialog appears at the first start up.
 * Fixed bug with Unknown gsdriver on stock firmwares.
 * Updated hardware checking system.
 * Optimized application code.
 * Updated translation for EN and RU localization.

 Version 6.0

 * Added Recovery installer.
 * Fixed bug with Color gamut.
 * Optimized application code.
 * Updated translation for EN and RU localization.

 Version 5.2

 * Added Memory speed index.
 * New UI style.
 * Updated translation for EN and RU localization.

 Version 5.1

 * Fixed bug with showing GPU freq.
 * Fixed bug when after rebooting the tablet he restores CPU and GPU freq.
 * Added firmware checking on startup Freezes fix function.
 * After switching on/off function Fix freezes appear window with info how to install.
 * Added index of RAM in About system.
 * Updated translation for EN and RU localization.

 Version 5.0

 * Added index of CPU and GPU freq.
 * Added Advices in menu.
 * Fixed bug with Unlocking GPU Freq.
 * Updated translation for EN and RU localization.

 Version 4.0

 * Added Fix the color gamut function and changed Fix freezes function.
The new function fixes the problems with color gamut after flashing firmware.
 * Improved method of displaying information in About program menu.
 * Added GSensor driver info in About GSensor function.
 * Updated translation for EN and RU localization.

 Version 3.0

 * Added About system info and About program info.
 * Fixed bug with showing Model on firmware AOKP and AOSPA in About system.
 * Optimized application code.

 Version 2.0

 * Optimized function About GSensor.
 * Added Platform,CPU and GPU strings in About device menu.
 * Fixed bug with Model in About device menu.
 * Updated translation for EN and RU localization.

 Version 1.9-open_beta_test

 * Removed GSensor Calibration.
 * Added About device menu.
 * Added warning text for Fix freezes function.
 * Updated translation for EN and RU localization.

 Version 1.8-open_beta_test

 * Some fixes for Gravity Sensor Calibration.
 * Some fixes in code and in translation.

 Version 1.7-open_beta_test

 * Updated CPU and GPU unlocking frequency System.
 * New function, Fix Freezes.
This function fix freezes at Ainol Captain(Rhino) on SharkAndroid firmware.
 * Fixed Saving System.
 * Some fixes.

 Version 1.6-closed_beta_test

 * Updated CPU and GPU unlocking frequency System.
 * Some fixes.

 Version 1.5-closed_beta_test

 * Added Gravity Sensor Calibration.
 * Update UI style.

 Version 1.4-test

 * New UI style.
 * Updated hardware checking system.
 * Fixed bugs.

 Version 1.3-test

 * Updated Changelog list system.
 * Updated Unlocking CPU and GPU freq system.

 Version 1.2-test

 * Added Update App system.
 * New main icon.

 Version 1.1-test

 * Added source code url.
 * Added hardware checking.
 * First build.
